    • 方法详细资料

      • setRangeRatio

        public void setRangeRatio(int ratio)
        Set the range ratio. Normally, the Y-axis will reserve some space for the maximum and minimum values to make show better. So this field was introduced to assist in calculating the maximum and minimum values. The actual maximum value of the Y-axis is: The maximum value in lines + range * ratio The actual minimum value of the Y-axis is: The minimum value in lines - range * ratio.
        参数:
        ratio - The range ratio to set.

      • getRangeRatio

        public float getRangeRatio()
        返回:
        The current range ratio.
        另请参阅:
        setRangeRatio(int)

      • calcMinMax

        public void calcMinMax()
        从类复制的说明: Axis
        Calculate the min and max values by the axis itself.
        指定者:
        calcMinMax 在类中 Axis
